title: If you say GG after a game ends in surrender...
body:
...then you are a liar.
Good games end at the nexus.

replies.body:
This post is missing
--> meme
--> game
--> reason to exist
Yeah well, that's just like....your opinion man
Or, you know, show sportsmanship and honor in defeat by letting the enemy team know that you and them played a good game.
Then the other four members of your team ignore that and say ez.
